items.headline: ‘Opening up to possibilities’: Olympic diver Greg Louganis on his new life in Panama at 65, after auctioning off his gold medals

items.headline: Trump says Venezuela will send U.S. up to 50 million barrels of oil — and he’ll control the proceeds
items.summary_en: President Donald Trump late Tuesday said Venezuela will send the U.S. 30 million to 50 million barrels of oil, which will then be sold by the U.S. and the proceeds controlled by him.
